Holiday Shopping

October 20, 2025

# Experience more joy this holiday

By

- [Nicci Trovinger
– *General Manager, Windows*](https://blogs.windows.com/devices/author/ntrovinger/)

This holiday season, joy comes in many forms, whether it’s finding the perfect gift, creating new traditions or simply spending time together. With Microsoft, it’s easier than ever to make the season meaningful, creative and connected.

That’s why Microsoft is here to help you **gift smarter, celebrate meaningfully** and **enjoy every moment** with a lineup of innovative products and services designed to fit seamlessly into your life. From powerful PCs that unlock creativity with Windows 11 and Copilot experiences that increase productivity, to immersive Xbox gaming experiences that bring everyone together, Microsoft is making it easier than ever to unlock the gift of joy through your technology.

[!\[\](https://blogs.windows.com/wp-content/themes/microsoft-stories-theme/img/theme/shims/16x9.png)](https://youtu.be/7Nbf1fqxcCM)

## **Gift smarter**

Whether you’re searching for a gift for your loved ones that they’re excited to use or wanting to splurge on yourself, Microsoft’s lineup of Copilot+ PCs is sure to have what you need. With Windows 10 reaching [end of support](https://blogs.windows.com/windowsexperience/2025/06/24/stay-secure-with-windows-11-copilot-pcs-and-windows-365-before-support-ends-for-windows-10/) as of Oct. 14, 2025, upgrading to a new PC is a timely and meaningful gift—one that ensures security, performance and access to the very latest Microsoft innovations.

The [Surface Pro](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/surface/devices/surface-pro) gives you the power of a PC with the flexibility of a tablet all in one device. With all-day battery life and a lightweight design, the Pro is perfect for your loved one who is always on the go. Choose from two different screen sizes and six color options.

Want tech that can handle your everyday tasks with powerful performance? Look no further than the [Surface Laptop](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/surface/devices/surface-laptop). With its PixelSense touchscreen and AI-accelerated experiences, it’s sure to impress even your most tech-savvy family member. Available in three different screen sizes and six different color options, including Violet, Ocean and Dune, you’re sure to find the version that’s just right for whoever you’re shopping for this holiday season.

Every person has a preference—whether it’s a lightweight device for staying connected on the go, or a powerful PC built for work, creativity and everything in between. Microsoft’s trusted partners offer a wide range of Windows 11 and Copilot+ PCs to match how you live, work and play. With choices across colors, features, form factors and price points from leading brands like [Acer](https://store.acer.com/en-us/laptops/copilot-plus-pc), [ASUS](https://www.asus.com/laptops/for-home/all-series/filter?Category=Copilot-PC-devices), [Dell](https://www.dell.com/en-us/shop/deals), [HP](https://www.hp.com/us-en/software/microsoft-copilot-pcs.html), [Lenovo](https://www.lenovo.com/us/en/copilot-plus-pc/) and [Samsung](https://www.samsung.com/us/computing/galaxy-book-copilot-plus-pcs/), it’s easy to find a PC that fits your holiday budget and brings joy to whoever’s on your list.

And when it’s time to shop, [Copilot in Edge](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge/features/copilot?form=MA13FJ) can help you compare prices across websites, brainstorm gift ideas while you search, and set alerts for gift deals—all without breaking your festive flow.

## **Celebrate meaningfully**

As Microsoft ushers in the next era of [Windows experiences](https://blogs.windows.com/windowsexperience/2025/10/16/making-every-windows-11-pc-an-ai-pc/), your new Copilot+ PC is designed to help you do more this holiday. Copilot on Windows 11 makes multitasking on your Surface feel magical with Voice and Vision. With voice access and a new “Hey Copilot” wake word, you can interact hands-free with [Copilot Voice](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot/for-individuals/do-more-with-ai/general-ai/what-is-copilot-voice?form=MA13PW) that helps you intuitively check-off your holiday to-do list without lifting a finger. From asking for the next steps in a holiday recipe to curating your holiday “vibe” to design custom wrapping paper and holiday cards, it’s all possible with a simple voice command. It’s the computer you can talk to, and it’s designed to help you get the most out of your tech this season. With Windows 11, your PC becomes a proactive partner, helping you stay organized, inspired and ahead of the holiday rush. When invoking [Copilot Vision](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot/blog/2025/06/12/copilot-vision-on-windows-with-highlights-is-now-available-in-the-u-s/), you can have real-time conversations about what you see, when navigating your travel itinerary, weather forecast and packing list for your winter getaway. With Vision, Copilot on Windows will be your holiday planning companion, offering live tutorials, step-by-step instructions, and with highlights, it can even show you where to click.

[Windows 11](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/ai-features) continues to build in experiences that make celebrating the holidays easier. Exclusive to Copilot + PCs, you can use [Relight](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/relight-in-photos-7e6235c4-5dac-4a3e-9315-683ed88d4125) in the Photos app to refresh family photos before they make their debut in the holiday card. Available on Windows 11 PCs, the new [agent in Settings](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/learning-center/two-must-try-ai-tools-that-simplify-tasks) simplifies troubleshooting—no stress, no guesswork—when you’re home for the holidays, helping your loved ones with their devices.

[!\[\](https://blogs.windows.com/wp-content/themes/microsoft-stories-theme/img/theme/shims/16x9.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b6EJxjdRPAw)

## **Enjoy every moment**

The holidays are all about meaningful moments, and [Copilot](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot/for-individuals?form=MA13YThttps://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-copilot/for-individuals?form=MA13YT) helps make them easier to create. Whether you’re planning a cozy night in with friends, organizing a family game tournament or crafting a personalized playlist for your annual gathering, Copilot can help you brainstorm ideas, coordinate plans and bring everyone together. With natural language prompts and voice-enabled actions, it’s like having a thoughtful assistant by your side—so you can spend less time managing details and more time making memories.

Whether you’re teaming up with friends or diving into solo adventures, Xbox makes it easy to play your way this holiday season. [Xbox Game Pass](https://www.xbox.com/en-US/xbox-game-pass?msockid=2bd92f32a2f16f982fe339b7a31e6e51) is the best way to discover and play games, unlocking a massive library of titles across console, PC and cloud.

The new [ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X](https://www.xbox.com/en-us/xbox-on-handhelds?xr=shellnav) handhelds combine the best of Xbox, Windows and ASUS to create an entirely new kind of handheld—offered in two unique versions designed for every type of player. These devices make it easier than ever to access your games, from Xbox, Battle.net and installed games from other leading PC storefronts. Players can even start a conversation with [Gaming Copilot](https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2025/09/18/gaming-copilot-xbox-pc-mobile/) (Beta) on the Xbox Ally devices to get recommendations, tips and insights with the push of a button.

Xbox also has a great lineup of games for players to enjoy over the holiday season. With [Xbox Play Anywhere](https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/xbox-play-anywhere?msockid=2bd92f32a2f16f982fe339b7a31e6e51), you can purchase a game once and your progress moves with you across console, Windows PC and supported gaming handhelds. Over 1,000 games are available with Xbox Play Anywhere, including top holiday titles like [Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4](https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/tony-hawks-pro-skater-3-4?msockid=2bd92f32a2f16f982fe339b7a31e6e51), [The Outer Worlds 2](https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/the-outer-worlds-2?msockid=2bd92f32a2f16f982fe339b7a31e6e51) (launching Oct. 29) and [Call of Duty®: Black Ops 7](https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/call-of-duty-black-ops-7?msockid=2bd92f32a2f16f982fe339b7a31e6e51) (launching Nov. 14).

## **Shop with care**

Ready to bring home the magic? Whether you’re upgrading your setup or gifting someone special, the [Microsoft Store](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/) is your go-to destination this holiday season. Shopping on [Microsoft.com](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/b/why-microsoft-store) offers exclusive deals, price protection all season long, flexible payment options, and free shipping and returns until Jan. 31, 2026—plus support to help you find the perfect device or accessory. You can also find Microsoft products at trusted retailers like Best Buy, Target, Walmart and Amazon, making it easy to shop wherever and however you prefer. From Windows 11 PCs and Xbox consoles to the latest accessories and Copilot-enabled experiences, now’s the time to check off your list and make the season unforgettable.
